dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5017 IH: To prohibit United States non-security assistance to Mexico.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Yoho introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit United States non-security assistance to Mexico.

section.header: Prohibition on United States non-security assistance to Mexico

subsection.text: No funds available to any department or agency of the Government of the United States may be used to provide non-security assistance to Mexico unless an Act of Congress providing that Mexicoâ€™s border with the United States is secured is enacted into law after the date of the enactment of this Act.
The prohibition in subsection (a) applies with respect to funds made available for fiscal year 2015 and subsequent fiscal years.
